selected_quotes: New fossil finds date fully modern birds back to 131 ma. These birds lack key dinosaur traits.
The first #fossil #bird just got older. Cool #Cretaceous cousin of #dinosaurs discovered.
Trying to figure out why the taxonomic description of a new bryozoan never gets so much press

citation.abstract: Ornithuromorpha is the most inclusive clade containing extant birds but not the Mesozoic Enantiornithes. The early evolutionary history of this avian clade has been advanced with recent discoveries from Cretaceous deposits, indicating that Ornithuromorpha and Enantiornithes are the two major avian groups in Mesozoic. Here we report on a new ornithuromorph bird, Archaeornithura meemannae gen. et sp. nov., from the second oldest avian-bearing deposits (130.7 Ma) in the world. The new taxon is referable to the Hongshanornithidae and constitutes the oldest record of the Ornithuromorpha. However, A. meemannae shows few primitive features relative to younger hongshanornithids and is deeply nested within the Hongshanornithidae, suggesting that this clade is already well established. The new discovery extends the record of Ornithuromorpha by five to six million years, which in turn pushes back the divergence times of early avian lingeages into the Early Cretaceous.
citation.title: The oldest record of ornithuromorpha from the early cretaceous of China

news.title: Oldest Ancestor of Modern Birds Found

wikipedia.title: Archaeornithura
wikipedia.summary: Archaeornithura is an extinct genus of ornithuromorphs from the early Cretaceous period.

wikipedia.title: Euornithes
wikipedia.summary: Euornithes (meaning "true birds" in Greek) is the name of a natural group which includes the most recent common ancestor of all avialans closer to modern birds than to Sinornis.

wikipedia.title: Hongshanornithidae
wikipedia.summary: Hongshanornithidae is an extinct group of early ornithuromorph birds from the early Cretaceous period of China.

wikipedia.title: Bird
wikipedia.summary: Birds (class Aves) are a group of endothermic vertebrates. Modern birds are characterised by feathers, a beak with no teeth, the laying of hard-shelled eggs, a high metabolic rate, a four-chambered heart, and a lightweight but strong skeleton.

wikipedia.title: Ornithothoraces
wikipedia.summary: Ornithothoraces is a group of avialans that includes all enantiornithines ("opposite birds") and the euornithes ("true birds"), which contains modern birds and their ancestors.

facebook.title: Feathery fossils peg early birds to even earlier date - BBC News
facebook.summary: Paleontologists in China have discovered a new species of prehistoric bird. ‘Archaeornithura meemannae’ is now the oldest known ancestor of all modern birds. The full article, published in Nature Communications, can be read here: http://bit.ly/1IfRvJ3
